title: Calories in a Mozzarella
meta_description: Discover calories in a mozzarella serving (1 oz), including full nutrition breakdown, protein, fat, carbs, and easy tweaks for your diet.
assumptions: 1 oz (28g) serving of part-skim, low-moisture mozzarella cheese; standard block or shredded form.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, fat content (part-skim vs. whole milk), moisture level, and preparation. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: A 1 oz serving of part-skim mozzarella cheese contains about 85 kcal and 6 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging.

tweaks.label: Use fresh mozzarella ball (higher moisture, ~1 oz)

faqs.q: How many calories in a mozzarella stick?
faqs.a: About 85 kcal for a 1 oz part-skim mozzarella stick.

faqs.q: What's the protein in a serving of mozzarella?
faqs.a: Roughly 6.3 g protein per 1 oz serving.
